job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision
job.description: pstrongBuilders and Fixers WantedstrongppnbspppEphesoft provides intelligent document processing solutions with industryleading technology to help enterprises maximize their productivity Using AI and patented machine learning technology Ephesofts platform captures data from documents enriches it with context and amplifies the power of that data adding intelligence to accelerate any business process and drive successful digital transformation Thousands of customers worldwide use Ephesoft to save costs improve accuracy and fuel their journey towards the autonomous enterprise Ephesoft is headquartered in Irvine Calif with regional offices throughout the US EMEA and Asia Pacific To learn more visitnbspephesoftcomppbrppstrongJob DescriptionstrongppbrppstrongReady to invent the futurestrongnbspEphesoft is immediately hiring a talented driven Machine Learning Engineer with a focus in computer vision to play a key role in developing a highprofile AI platform in use by organizations around the world The ideal candidate will be a talented generalist with strong core competencies in designing computer vision solutions and writing productionquality code This position is an earlycareer opportunity for candidates with a strong educational background and some practical experience in machine learning who are looking for opportunities to hone their skills as well as learn and master new onesppnbspppYou may be a good fit for this role if youpulliEnjoy wearing hats Many many hats You will develop code tune existing models work with cloud resources and build ML systems that wont exist anywhere elseliliCan be honest with your own work Sometimes we will build industryleading products and sometimes our ideas will flop You will build many custom and meaningful metrics to help determine what our clients immediately use and what is tabled for laterliliHave a strong aversion to explicit for loops and comprehensions in your ML codenbspDetermining how to make ML products performant and accurate is a big part of our workliliLike having friends Our workflow means constant collaboration with software engineers to bring ML prototypes into productionliliEnjoy watching the fruits of your labor flourish You will own projects from conception to data gathering to productionliliWould like to teach and learn from your colleagues about ML best practicesliliLike Legos You will develop ML libraries and utilities in Python that will be stacked on and used across many code basesliulpnbspppnbspYou will bring to this rolepulliLove for solving problems and working in a small agile environmentliliDedication to maintaining a fun friendly and collaborative work environmentliliHunger for learning new skills and sharing your findings with othersliliDeep knowledge of both traditional and deep learning approaches in computer visionliliPractical experience in implementing machine learning solutionsliulpnbspppstrongMinimum Required QualificationsstrongpulliBABS degree in a related technical field or direct professional experience in computer vision not less than 2 yearslili1 years experience or at least one internship focused on computer visionliliExperience in one or more general purpose programming languages Python C Java RliliExperience with numerical and data science libraries scikitlearn Pandas NumPy kernlab etcliliExperience with at least one major deep learning framework TensorFlow MXNet PyTorch Caffe etcliliExperience with data visualization libraries gglot2 matplotlib seaborn etcliliDeep knowledge of common computer vision problems and their solutions semantic segmentation  FCNN object detection  FRCNNSSDetc image registration  homographynbspliliFamiliarity with version control systems GitHub Bitbucket TFS etcliliA portfolio showcasing at least one high quality computervision related project you have developedliulpbrppstrongBonus QualificationsstrongpulliAdvanced degree MSMAPhD in machine learning computer vision or data sciencelili2nbspyears of industry experience developing and building computer vision solutionsliliExperience implementing stateoftheart deep learning models for object detection semantic segmentation andor image classificationliliExperience implementing data preprocessing pipelinesliliExperience with AWS Google Cloud Azure or other cloudbased platformsliliDeep understanding of machine learning algorithm internalsliliAdvanced knowledge of Python data structures and how to build high performance systemsliulpnbspppstrongAdditional informationstrongppEphesoft is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerppThis role can be located in either our Irvine CalifornianbspBoise Idaho offices or remote in the United StatesppCandidates outside of the United States will not be consideredppbrppAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelinesppAgency candidates will not be considered for this rolenbspAgencies should carefully follow our guidelines at ephesoftcomcareersp
